title: Turning off threading in Ctrl+Shift+F method of Search
content:
Hi,

Recently, a Thunderbird update seemed to have turned on Threading of displayed messages across my folders. I was able to turn it off, no problem.

However, it also turned on threading in my Search Results and that still remains. I cannot find a way to turn it off there.

Note: I open the Search window by clicking on Edit > Find > Search Messages, otherwise known as Ctrl+Shift+F.

Note: I am NOT talking about Ctrl-K or any other method for which the posted Community solutions do not work.

How can I turn off threading in the Search results when using the method of Ctrl+Shift+F ?

Thank you.
